tasks.label: Install Dependencies
tasks.command: if [ -f bun.lock ] || [ -f bun.lockb ]; then bun install --frozen-lockfile; else bun install; fi

windows.command: if (Test-Path bun.lock -or Test-Path bun.lockb) { bun install --frozen-lockfile } else { bun install }

tasks.label: Setup Pre-commit
tasks.command: if [ ! -f .git/hooks/pre-commit ]; then uv run --active pre-commit install; else echo 'pre-commit hook already installed'; fi

windows.command: if (-not (Test-Path .git/hooks/pre-commit)) { uv run --active pre-commit install } else { echo 'pre-commit hook already installed' }
